website_summaries.verdict: An affordable option for those looking for a smaller chair that offers both excellent looks and comfort.
pros: A great value that blends an attractive look and comfort with a smaller, lighter size
cons: Legs can be a little hard to attach correctly
Can seem a bit too small for those on the taller side

website_summaries.verdict: A small armchair that works well as an accent piece. Adds elegance to any space.
cons: Small size may not be comfortable to some

customer_reviews.title: They look great
customer_reviews.text: Great chairs!! Great quality and simple to assemble!! Shipped very quickly which was the main reason I purchased them and the price was comparable to there I found online
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Bad Shipping Container
customer_reviews.text: The construction of the chair is very good, however the material on the sides near the bottom had foam exposed that had to clipped off. It does serve it's purpose as a secondary chair in my office. Biggest concern was when I received the chair in a box, it was completely crushed down on all sides. An attempt was made by whomever, to completely wrap the box with shipping tape. After opening I found one of arms to have been pressed down and out of shape. I did manage to get it back in 90% of the original shape. Probably should have returned, but I have a need for a chair.
customer_reviews.author: J M.

customer_reviews.title: Measurements are off
customer_reviews.text: The measurements from the 'drawn' diagram is way off. It shows the front measures 19 3/4 inches from the bottom to the top of the seat cushion. It is actually 11 inches. Since I planned on using this with out the legs, this measurement was important. But the measurement was off by more than 8 inches. ALSO my chair did not come with the legs anyway....Returned.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty chair with VERY reasonable price tag.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty chair. It's not the most expensive piece of furniture out there, so yes, it's one of those "you get what you pay for" purchases, but I am totally happy with it. We needed extra seating in our living room and needed a chair to tie our room together, and it's just right. We've gotten many compliments on it, and people ask where we got it and how much. Most people are pleasantly surprised that it was an Amazon purchase with a very reasonable price tag. I do not think you'll be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: KG

customer_reviews.title: GREAT CHAIR
customer_reviews.text: I NEEDED A SMALL CLUB CHAIR FOR MY LIVING ROOM. THIS CHAIR IS A GREAT VALUE FOR THE MONEY AND THE QUALITY IS ACCEPTABLE. I WOULD DEFINITELY PURCHASE AGAIN!
customer_reviews.author: CA

customer_reviews.title: Not a "quality" piece of furniture
customer_reviews.text: The assembly instructions (just the legs) were poorly drawn. The shape of the receiver and the leg does not clearly define how those are paired. The under side shows how haphazard the upholstery and other components were installed. The chair itself is comfortable and with limited use it should last a long time but "only time will tell".
customer_reviews.author: JCM

customer_reviews.title: Great chair for pet owners
customer_reviews.text: I wanted chairs that looked good and would hold up to dog nails. These are them. For us, the chairs are not supposed to be high function, just look nice in an entry way and have an occasional butt; however, our two medium dogs will jump on them. So far they have held up! No rips or scratch marks plus the faux leather quickly cleans up dog fur. I would rate them a 5 but the instructions were not too good and the bolts were a bit tricky.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence J. Chambers Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Good for sitting, not for lounging
customer_reviews.text: Cheap seating and works great as a chair, but, as others have noted, you can't really get comfortable in it. The back is too low and you can't sink into it, so it feel like you are constantly sitting upright or being pushed forward and out.
customer_reviews.author: MCL

customer_reviews.title: 2017+2.5 years
customer_reviews.text: When it came in the mail in 2016, I was taken aback because it didn't look like what the material is made of would withstand a heavy beating. But hey, I've had this since 2016 with constant use and it still looks about the same as it ever did. My girlfriend's dad recently said after having house-sit for us for three weeks that its the comfiest place to sit in the entire house, too! A great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Stahlbaum

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Bedroom Chair
customer_reviews.text: Quite pleased with this order. This comfortable well made chair was carefully packaged, quickly shipped, and easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: lanmill

customer_reviews.title: Small, light - great for kids.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a kid as a reading chair. Easy to put together, move and clean. It’s not the most comfortable to lounge but works very well to sit straighter to read or use a computer o a desk.
customer_reviews.author: E-online-73

customer_reviews.title: Great seating for a small place
customer_reviews.text: This chair fit the bill to add that little bit extra seating in a rental we have. Since it is a rental I needed something that didn't cost a fortune, but was sturdy enough. Hopefully this will do the job. Plus it looks good. Only rating 4 stars for the unknown factor of durability.
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: This chair is awesome. I put it in my bedroom as a ...
customer_reviews.text: This chair is awesome. I put it in my bedroom as a sitting/put my shoes on chair; and it's great. I thought it might be to small for my build and frame, but it is not. I'm a grown as man and it sits just great.
customer_reviews.author: Sapper27

customer_reviews.title: Nice,  but the back is a little lumpy.
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a good purchase for the price. The legs can be tricky like other reviewers stated. I found out that they need to have the straight edge of the leg corners facing out when installed. There's a slight groove on the other side of the corners' edge and that needs to face in towards the chairs center. Hope that makes sense. Also the padding in the chair altered slightly so there's just a tiny feeling of a lump as you sit down On your back.
customer_reviews.author: Van Marie Media

customer_reviews.title: Not bad,  It is not really great for a bigger person.
customer_reviews.text: I like the chair is seems to be made well, and I put it together with no problem. Yes there is assembly required. I am going to try to keep the dogs off it and I hope that it holds up to the traffic in my house. However, I do like the chair. It came really fast and was packaged well.
customer_reviews.author: Greekiss

customer_reviews.title: Good leather material
customer_reviews.text: Good leather material, nice dark brown color, sturdy, good size for an average size adult and smaller person. It works great for my sons room.
customer_reviews.author: 🏤🏤🌍🏖🏦☢🌈🌀🌀❄☄❄🔥☂️☄☢⛄☔🔥🌀🌀🔥☄🔥☄🌀🚈🚝🎡🚅🚝🚑🚞🚞🎰🎭🚅🚝🎢🚝🚝🚈🎡🚄🚅🎰🚒🚞🚈🏭🌁🗼⛪💒🌁⛺♨️🕋🏭🏭🏬🏪🌁🏩🌁⛼💒⛲🌁6qeq17n Bqv3Bqv36gegqnn2d qqn216t. 2qStephen and Kate

customer_reviews.title: buyer beware....it seems theres a problem with quality control here
customer_reviews.text: chair is very comfy but one of the legs came with the drilled holes too large for the screws. i was gonna have to send the whole chair back at my expense in order to receive another chair. why doesnt this company just go ahead and send a replacement leg? ridiculous!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra A Lopez

customer_reviews.title: It's perfect for a small space
customer_reviews.text: I've been searching for months for an accent chair for my livingroom and finally found this chair. It's the perfect size for the amount of room I had. It looks very good and is also comfortable. Able to assemble the legs in less that 15 minutes. Highly recommend it as an accent chair.
customer_reviews.author: Roger B

customer_reviews.title: Nice chair and was easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Nice chair and was easy to put together, we've had people who weigh 300+ pounds sit it in with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, low price and pretty attractive/elegant.
customer_reviews.text: I have bought about 5 sets of these for my showrooms. Customers love them! Inexpensive but good quality and hold up to a lot.of wear! Very pleased! Easy to set up too!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Corp

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Appear to be good so far, but very short legs
customer_reviews.author: The King

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this chair for my office at home as a guest chair. The size was what I was looking for and it was easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: SGP

customer_reviews.title: We like the chair very much.
customer_reviews.text: We had some trouble with assembly. it was not as obvious as it might have been as to which way the back legs we're to slant. Can't say anything about wear but our clients like the barrel shape, height and firm but not too hard seat. Worth the money I would say.
customer_reviews.author: author

customer_reviews.title: Great looking accent chair and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Great looking accent chair and comfortable. For reference I'm 6'2" and 240 pounds. When I sit in it it doesn't creak shift weight, nothing, feels very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Deluxxx

customer_reviews.title: Nice chair...great price!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this chair for an office of a trucking company. Looks great, light weight and will clean up easy...just what i was looking for. My 14 year old son put this chair together with no problems...just watch the leg configuration and you are good to go!
customer_reviews.author: cin1165

customer_reviews.title: Bad design where the legs are stored
customer_reviews.text: Returned chair Looked great however I was unable to remove the cushion as the instructions said to remove the legs. Poor design!
customer_reviews.author: Ruth M Conlon

customer_reviews.title: Nice but had a hard time with the legs and it wobbles.
customer_reviews.text: After getting the legs on right following the numbering on the instructions. It was wobbly...it kept limping from one leg. Got them off and tried it again....I'm keeping it cause it's nice enough even though it wobbles a little.
customer_reviews.author: Teresita Montesino

customer_reviews.title: Great chair! Looks great
customer_reviews.text: Great chair! Looks great, feels great! Bought this for a bedroom corner. Not a huge chair so a larger man might not be comfortable. But perfect for my daughter's room.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel G.

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Good chair, sturdy, looks nice, actually comfy for being smaller.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Where is my other chair?!
customer_reviews.text: Chair is perfect...I ordered 2 and only 1 came. Rating reflects my wait for other chair. It’s been 2 weeks
customer_reviews.author: Vachel

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Very nice chair, petite, good for smaller spaces - great price
customer_reviews.author: David Groce

customer_reviews.title: Best chairs ever!
customer_reviews.text: The best buy online or in store anywhere! thin leather over fabric backing. Looks great! Comfy. seat is deep, needed small back cushion. Everyone that sits in or sees these is in love with them!
customer_reviews.author: PS2you

customer_reviews.title: Check your items upon arrival and take pictures
customer_reviews.text: I’m returning it for same product, I I’ll give them a better rating if it does not come out as defective as the first one. Their shipping box was damaged and partially open.
customer_reviews.author: Jose A Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: I like the chair
customer_reviews.text: I like the chair. It is comfortable. Although there are parts where the leather is incomplete and barely hidden. It will do for its price. I’m satisfied. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Chair!
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, easy to assemble and like the slightly higher back than many barrel chairs.
customer_reviews.author: Muriel C.

customer_reviews.title: LEG BROKE after 3 weeks of minimal use!
customer_reviews.text: One of the legs broke while my 150 lb, 87 year old father was sitting in it. He sustained injuries.
customer_reviews.author: Woody

customer_reviews.title: Great accent chairs!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Looks even better in person. Perfect as accent chairs.
customer_reviews.author: Christy Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: This chair exceeded my expectations! I'm very pleased with the quality and the size of it. Would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya S.

customer_reviews.title: EASY TO ASSEMBLE
customer_reviews.text: CHAIRS LOOK GREAT , NOT SURE ON COMFORT BUT I WILL BE USING THEM IN A ROOM THAT IS NOT USED OFTEN .
customer_reviews.author: Winsome

customer_reviews.title: 4 chairs, all damaged.
customer_reviews.text: Four chairs, all damaged with holes either from the manufacturer or from shipping, two of the chairs were also poorly wrapped (leather was wrinkly and padding was uneven). Better hope you have a large enough vehicle to take them back to UPS while returning them.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Shrader

customer_reviews.title: its a small comfortable chair and i like it
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time am buying furniture from amazon and it looks impressive. For the price I got, its a small comfortable chair and i like it.
customer_reviews.author: Jayakrishna Tiramdasu

customer_reviews.title: holds up great, looks great
customer_reviews.text: I have had two in my office for a year, holds up great, looks great. Can't beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: Bostonnet

customer_reviews.title: linon simon club chair
customer_reviews.text: The club chair which I really do love goes good with my decor, its comfortable and just the right height for me..
customer_reviews.author: pleased

customer_reviews.title: Not quite big enough to curl up in but very nice looking
customer_reviews.text: Very nice but not as comfortable as I hoped! They are beautiful chairs with a foot rest they are much more comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Jlynn

customer_reviews.title: Looks like a $400 chair.
customer_reviews.text: Looks like a $400 chair. Sits well and comfortable. Legs are good but had a little install issue. Nothing a little wood trimming couldn't handle.
customer_reviews.author: John C.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful chair
customer_reviews.text: Love the chair it fits in very well with the decor and is well built. I may by another one to match
customer_reviews.author: Robert J. Cerullo

customer_reviews.title: Great chair for the price
customer_reviews.text: Used these chairs in our upscale office kitchen area. They look sharp with a modern design and don't take up a lot of room. Great chair for the price. Ray Hippele Zim Development Co.
customer_reviews.author: raymond hippele

customer_reviews.title: It would have been nice to be able to remove the pillow from the ...
customer_reviews.text: It would have been nice to be able to remove the pillow from the chair. However, for the price it is a nice little chair.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Very easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Very easy to assemble! The weird scent goes away in about a day.
customer_reviews.author: Latoya

customer_reviews.title: Well built and easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Well built and easy to put together. This chair looks great in a contemporary setting. I liked it so much I ordered a second one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Chocolate Leather!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful and look way more expensive than they are.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than anticipated
customer_reviews.text: Better than anticipated. So happy! Looks perfect. All of the previous customer reviews helped so much. Strongly considering ordering another.
customer_reviews.author: Alisha Wilkes

customer_reviews.title: Good Chair for the Price
customer_reviews.text: A little wonky to assemble, but looks polished and classy. You can't beat the price on this, just be prepared for some mild frustration with the assembly.
customer_reviews.author: Bulldog

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this chair. It has definitely met my expectations period thank you so much.
customer_reviews.author: Bernie

customer_reviews.title: Picture was better than the real thing
customer_reviews.text: Picture was better than the real thing. Chairs are nice for a female or small framed person. Legs in the rear curve under the chair making it look very unstable if you lean back. These chairs also are not as well made as they appear in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love them! Bought these chairs for seating in the color lounge area of my hair studio.They look great , are very comfortable and easy to clean. I saw the same chair today in Marshall's Homegoods for about $50 more, so feel good about what I paid as well.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Warriner

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: easy to put together and looks great for the price
customer_reviews.author: randy trevino

customer_reviews.title: Surprised!!  but pleasantly!!
customer_reviews.text: The design, as pictured, fooled me. I believed that the cushion was a separate piece. Regardless, it certainly does give that appearance. As with most chairs of this design the seat was a bit on the stiff side, but with continued use it has become quite comfortable. They look great in the bay window location in which they have been placed.
customer_reviews.author: Keith M. Regan

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful chairs
customer_reviews.text: These chairs are exactly what I wanted! I was looking for a set of small, comfortable chairs for a conversation area. They are exactly as advertised and comfortable for all ages and sizes. We simply had to attach the legs and replace the bottom cover. They're not a lounge chair, but a great little straight chair to add seating where needed when you don't have a lot of space.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Great little compact chair for the money.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little compact chair for the money and is perfect for those small little spaces. You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Nover

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful bought two of them looks great in my living room
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Shipped incomplete
customer_reviews.text: The chair shipped without the female screw anchors in one of the legs, making it impossible to fully assemble. I happen to be somewhat handy, so Im going to try to find a way around it rather than deal with the hassle of returning it. What a pain, though. Besides that, the chair seems to be of good quality. But still, one star for the frustrations.
customer_reviews.author: Alison Treadaway

customer_reviews.title: Great looking chairs!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed for my home office, perfect size, and a fair price!! Good chairs for the price nice style.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel A Dumas

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The boxes the chair's were in were very damaged. Then I opened the boxes and took the chair's out and they had cuts on them. This is for an office and it is very disappointing when we have a time frame to have these by.
customer_reviews.author: jag

customer_reviews.title: accent chair
customer_reviews.text: Just small enough to fit in any corner and low enough to place in front a window. Perfect height. Firm and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas T Sproat

customer_reviews.title: Classy look at a bargain price
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these chairs for the front room of our home where we host Initial Outfitters parties. They have a classy visual appeal without breaking the bank. They are comfortable to sit in and have elicited multiple compliments. www.initialoutfitters.net/AMYMORRIS/
customer_reviews.author: BamaJAM

customer_reviews.title: Lincoln Club Chair
customer_reviews.text: No assembly instructions to cover connecting the legs to the base - difficult to determine the exact placement for the four legs.
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: Classy chair at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these chairs. They look very sharp in my living room. They're also very comfortable. Everything I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Great chair for small receptionist area
customer_reviews.text: Very nice chair with smaller space required. Great chair for an small business. The price a little high since it was not a real leather
customer_reviews.author: Amy Stewart

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: After I discovered the legs (who reads assembly instructions?), very happy with this chair. Comfortable and well made. Economical style.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice enough for the price
customer_reviews.text: This chair is nice enough. Does not look or feel like real leather at all which is a little disappointing. I knew that it was not leather before purchasing since I read the description of the chair but with certain items it is harder to tell. Chair wobbled slightly not sure if due to manufacturing or my wood floor. I just used leg pads on the 2 legs that appeared to not be level.
customer_reviews.author: J. Harris

customer_reviews.title: very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I bought 4 chairs. There is almost no cusion between the rough wooden frame of the chair and the weak leatherette so tiny perforations are found on the corners. Assembly was nearly impossible without extra tools like a chisle and hammer.
customer_reviews.author: John

product_meta.title: Linon Home Dcor Linon Home Decor Simon Club Chair, 33" x 28.25" x 25.5", Brown
product_meta.description: This modern Simon Club Chair features high arms and a deep seat, while the arching backrest and flared armrests provide a retro-modern design that is perfect for any setting. The chair is accentuated by tightly woven stitching and upholstered with stain and fade resistant wipe-clean vinyl. The hardwood frame will provide strength and stability for years to come. The arms and back are generously padded for extra comfort.
feature_bullets: Upholstered with stain and fade resistant wipe-clean vinyl
High arms and a deep seat

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars142 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
